00027 #define FOREACH_SERIE(index, dataset) \
00028         for (size_t index = 0; index < dataset->GetSerieCount(); index++)
00029 
00030 #define FOREACH_DATAITEM(index, serie, dataset) \
00031         for (size_t index = 0; index < dataset->GetCount(serie); index++)
